titles: Iudge Barkely his penitentiall complaint wherein he laments the condition of his present imprisonment, and the late corruptions of violated and inforced iustice.
notes: Verse - "What wonder's this, to heare a Terme should be".
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
keywords: Berkeley, Robert, --  Sir, 1584-1656 --  Early works to 1800.
